original_text: And the sons of Bela were ard and Naaman: of Ard, the family of the Ardites: and of Naaman, the family of the Naamites.
korean_text: 벨라의 아들들은 아릇과 나아만이라 아릇에게서 아릇 종족과 나아만에게서 나아만 종족이 났으니

sentences.original_text: And the sons of Bela were Ard and Naaman:
of Ard, the family of the Ardites:
and of Naaman, the family of the Naamites.
